website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, colorful, soft, and easy to fit over your horse’s head, there is plenty to appreciate about Weaver Leather’s line of nylon horse halters.
pros: Available in turquoise, red, black, green, and blue
Easy to put on and remove
cons: The vibrant color may fade over time when exposed to long periods of direct sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, broke on the first use after horse pulled back once.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my horse, and works great for my fully broke horse, but Ive got a green horse that's still learning, he pulled back once and this halter broke. It does not take a ton of pressure to break that cheek snap.
customer_reviews.author: Mo B

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I do Equestrian Giveaways on my youtube channel (GypsyEquestrian) and Weaver Leather is ALWAYS my go to for leads, halters, and reins. They have consistent quality at a fair price. Thanks weaver! I will continue to feature you in all of my giveaways! I love this aquamarine color!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Bell

customer_reviews.title: I have a MFT gelding that has a head that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a MFT gelding that has a head that no halter fits! This one fits and adjusts perfectly!! Also the color is bright. After weeks in the pasture it hasn't faded any or fallen off or rubbed into his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Great with added breakaway
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice halter for the price. I went to Dover and bough a breakaway piece. It's not a leather crown, but rather the cheek piece. To use it, you have to cut off a piece of the halter (the really small section between the crown buckle and the ring where the hook attaches). I ordered a horse size, which seems to be true to size. The blue is very vibrant, and has not lost it's color over a few months. Overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie HTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Oh bother.  Another item to return for exchange.
customer_reviews.text: Being adjustable didn't help. Still too small. 9-5-20 Add'l comments: Not a bother at all to return for exchange or refund. I was speaking of the "bother" it is to have a horse with big head. Nothing standard fits him. "Oh, bother" is a quote from Eeyore in Winnie-the-Pooh books!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Wire

customer_reviews.title: Halter is nice quality. It fits my horse well
customer_reviews.text: Halter is nice quality. It fits my horse well. Love the adjustable chin strap. HOWEVER, I do NOT like the throat clip. It rubbed a sore on my mare's head very easily. The end point of the clip rubs into the skin. The halter wasn't even tight on her. Very easily could have slipped my whole hand between her face and the halter. I think it was from her turning her head when she was tied up. My best guess? Needless to say I won't be using halters with a throat clip again.
customer_reviews.author: Skyz

customer_reviews.title: Nice halter for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice halter for the price. I've used for about a week Now the gold is starting to get removed where I connect the lead rope. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic but great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Its very simple but the quality is excellent. The bands are pretty thick and look like they can take a beating. The hardware is also quite heavy and no parts seem like they would break any time soon
customer_reviews.author: Tamika T.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing could be an issue
customer_reviews.text: Sizing could be an issue. We ordered the small one and it still too large for our 1 year old dexter cattle. Have to burn an additional hole in to make the back loop a bit tighter. Over all the halter appears to be in very good quality and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: yuchi

customer_reviews.title: Great halter
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy halter that is easy on and off with the throat clip. No more fussing with buckles. It fit's my large boned Curly Horse perfectly. It would probably also fit my Arab/Paint cross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and sturdy but need sizing to be more accommodating.
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy and well made, especially for the price. I don’t feel like I can give it all the stars though since I ordered the large and it’s a tad too small for my horse. He’s a draft-cross but he doesn’t have the full draft head and oversized halters & bridles are always too big for him.
customer_reviews.author: SConnor

customer_reviews.title: Too Flimsy!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on the name, as I expected a great quality halter. Instead, I received a very thin, flimsy halter that will NOT keep it's shape and it is almost IMPOSSIBLE to put it on the horse. It also didn't keep it's color and faded out almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: It said small horses and ponies. We ordered that and it was the size of a fully grown horse. We gave it to a friend with a horse. But will not order again
customer_reviews.author: G. krause

customer_reviews.title: good halters, good price, what more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: I have had horses for years and have had lots of halters. These are pretty darned decent halters! They are sized the same as your average halter, if you need some more holes, you jusy heat a nail on the burner and the burn in new holes as needed. The webbing is soft and the buckles are good. I prefer the type of safety snaps that these have, horses don't bend these out of shape as easily as some other I have used. AND a great selection of colors. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: L RUFF

customer_reviews.title: Great halter. Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great halter. Well made and sturdy. My horse stands 16.2HH so I ordered a large and it fits great. Arrived when promised.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W

customer_reviews.title: Good, durable, nice materials.
customer_reviews.text: It has held up fairly well, even through a machine wash on the cold, gentle cycle with mild soap. I do wish the clip was reversed so that the smooth side was laying against the horse's cheek, but it's a solid halter.
customer_reviews.author: Acidian

customer_reviews.title: Not evenly weighted
customer_reviews.text: The clip on the side is heavy so it's overly heavy on the one side and will not sit straight across the nose. I bought another halter at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Rahnalee Fafnis

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this halter. The regular horse size barely fits the regular size horse I bought it for but for the money it’s a nice halter.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and is very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old Appy gelding. It looks great and is very durable. And i switch between 2 horses and I can adjust it as need and it fits them perfectly! The color has not faded and everything came on time and in the condition promised. The only thing I have to note is that the clip has a sharp edge and digs into their face. I had it on my Appy for a show all day and it rubbed a spot on him. It is a simple fix though, i just flip the strap over so the edge is facing up and it still feels normal and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great halter!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a ton of these but this ones really nice! Quality and a lotta bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Compton

customer_reviews.title: Love it, fits my fine boned arab beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Love it, fits my fine boned arab beautifully. I'm happy with the durability, we've had it for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Buffum

customer_reviews.title: The halter material is very soft and flexible- it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The halter material is very soft and flexible- it doesn't hold it's shape enough, and sags on the horse's head. The material needs to be stiffer...it's going on a horse, not a princess.
customer_reviews.author: Vessel of Clay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great quality, unfortunately we are returning it, as I wasn't sure the size range we needed, and the one we ordered is way too big. I've already ordered a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: JoyfulNest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Halter...perfect fit...... Great Seller.... would buy in the future from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Pat F

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my horse. Nice color (blue) against his white skin Sturdy harness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uneven weight
customer_reviews.text: Haulter dose not stay centered. It has to much weight on the left side. Halter ends up in the horses eye.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer mallery

customer_reviews.title: Good halter.
customer_reviews.text: The color is very pretty and true to the picture online. The only negative is that the buckle holes stretch out too much.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Runs very large.
customer_reviews.text: Nice halter but the regular size is huge. Like large draft horse huge. My horse is average and this halter was miles too big.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Shumate

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy to catch horses
customer_reviews.text: super easy slip on over the ears, snap under the chin and off we go! bought one for each of my boys.
customer_reviews.author: -bb-

customer_reviews.title: Purple
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the shade of purple against her mares coat and likes that it’s adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Percy C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty purple, bad fit.
customer_reviews.text: It was a weirdly shaped halter, and in spite of it being adjustable, would never fit my mare's face. The snap on the throatlatch was too stiff to be useful. Love the Weaver brand but not this particular halter. It was a pretty purple.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie C

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice strong halter and a great price
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice strong halter and a great price. I love it and it looks wonderful on my horse. Thats my horse wearing the halter in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: GreAt value good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was nicer than I expected great quality very adjustable fit excellent true to size . Nice metal fittings
customer_reviews.author: Ron lee

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughbred X
customer_reviews.text: Good color, runs big. bought for my Thoroughbred Appy Cross and its a little saggy but he ruins them so fast that I'm not worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: i LOVE THIS HALTER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE THIS HALTER!!!!!! would definitely recomend!all of mg horse friends bought this and love it! we all ride diffrent horses but thia halter works amazingly because it can adjust. i al getting these for christmas!
customer_reviews.author: HorsesRlife

customer_reviews.title: Great halter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Great quality. Soft material, not stiff like some brands.
customer_reviews.author: Trevans

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it cuz i never know what the size my horses head is so this really awesome
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Montemayor

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Buckles
customer_reviews.text: I like that it can be fitted for the size needed.Lots of Buckles and Hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Faded to brown in one month!
customer_reviews.text: Functionally it's fine, though a little small. I hate that it faded in one month and became brown! The lead rope did not fade to match it. I like my tack to match!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable but faded quick
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I dont like it, is because within 3 months the color was completely gone by the sun and dirt. It's now a dingy dirty color. First photo was here recently and the second photo was when I first put it on. It's a little big but my horse has a thin face
customer_reviews.author: KayOttic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice very durable halter. I love the black with the brass. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: A. Speller

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I had had this halter for almost a year and it has been through a lot, but after a wash, it still looks brand new. The sizing can be changed very easily and has fit all my regular sized horses head’s perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: 5 star, must have halter!
customer_reviews.text: Love this halter! Was the perfect size, great quality and very durable. I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually review until I’ve had a product several months , for obvious reasons, but I’ve had this item before and it’s excellent. 💗
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: The small size will fit a Q.H. This is not a small horse halter
customer_reviews.author: B. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not a Breakway
customer_reviews.text: I think the halter itself it beautiful but I found out after buying it that the halter is not a breakaway halter. I will not use it. That information should be in the description. I am just disappointed that I did not know this before I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great! Decorated it for my friend that allows me to ride her horses and it fits nearly all of them (even fits her draft but barely).
customer_reviews.author: Miss. Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. The buckle is on backwards so digs into ...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. The buckle is on backwards so digs into the side of my mare's face. I bought 3 of them and 2 of them had the same problem. I don't have time to send them back so only have one that is useable. Won't order it again. Obviously one of the assemblers doesn't know what he/she is doing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the hardware on these halters and the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality halter, seems to run a bit big. My yearling will have to grow into it. I love the hardware on these halters and the fact that the nylon holds up better than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t lasting as long as the ones you get at the farm store.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! The color looks great on my bright red mare and fits her face perfectly, it’s also held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts easily, love the color options
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of colors available, the material quality is good, and it’s easy to put on and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Corey W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Super sturdy. I am very pleased with this halter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Haulter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Quality! Beautiful color... and 1/2 the price of the local shop!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable halter
customer_reviews.text: I use nylon halters daily- this is by far one of the best. Adjustable nose band, buckle on the throat latch, nylon is durable and stays soft after years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snap is backwards, otherwise is ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok Halter, snap is backwards and rubs horses throat. Wouldn't buy again unless snap is fixed. Fits horse ok and is good quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Stormnpete

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome halter. I love it and it looks exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Good halter
customer_reviews.text: No complaints; it's pretty, sturdy, and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: TheMissingLynx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my arab
customer_reviews.text: i always go with Weaver products as they are always decently priced and quality. Love the teal color!
customer_reviews.author: AK_Mama

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality halter for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality halter for the price. Buckles and hardware and a "heavier" duty hardware. Thick nylon. True to size. Great value horse halter.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Good quality Nice color. Looks nice on my mare. I put a different color on each horse so I know which one to grab quick! Not to mention they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, holding up fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, holding up fine so far. Still a bit bigger than what I was hoping, so I had to put an extra hole in it
customer_reviews.author: crg5107

customer_reviews.title: Great quality halter
customer_reviews.text: Great quality halter, and true to color! It works great for large horses, (and even adjusts down if you have a horse right between a more common size and oversize). I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item was not leather. It is nylon. Not what I expected😞
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lisa B. Paynter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality halter
customer_reviews.text: Fits like it should and will last for several years. Good halter
customer_reviews.author: jerel osborne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bright color, well made, exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. HORSE approved for wear and mum approves ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. HORSE approved for wear and mum approves of affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Stephaniekate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my quarter horse.
customer_reviews.text: Nice halter, fits my quarter horse just fine. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thin and cheap looking halter compared to the other halter from Weaver.
customer_reviews.author: Mthorsegal

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. The turquoise is so pretty. Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bright color, the clasp is well made as well.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice basic halter that fit my large horse perfectly. I like the throat snap for easy on and off, and it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color and it was a perfect fit for my horse.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product haven’t used it yet but good quality
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: False advertising - not leather
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a basic “leather” halter per title of ad It’s a nylon halter
customer_reviews.author: jenny erin

customer_reviews.title: Decent halter
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy, but worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: John Kneppler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shade of turquoise - well made. Bought 2 of them - good deal!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I like the durability and color of the halter. Great buy!!

customer_reviews.title: Well made and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great design, well made. high quality . I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Marsi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, great quality at a great price. I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! Bright color. Lots of adjustable points approx 13.2h Arabian.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made and true to size. Quick ship too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are off
customer_reviews.text: The size is way too big as a small. I ordered two, one purple, one red. The red is huge. I'm disappointed because we already took the tags off and can't return it. Otherwise, this would be sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Good quality... but the color I got was more blue not turquoise so only two stars I wanted Turquoise!!!!!!! But okay

customer_reviews.title: Great halter
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great color! Service was fast and pain-free.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice halter for the price. Color was right on.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as advertised. The colors were spot on from the pictures. No complaints here!

customer_reviews.title: but fit nicely and held up well
customer_reviews.text: Faded really quickly, but fit nicely and held up well.

customer_reviews.title: looks beautiful on our boy
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, looks beautiful on our boy. Very nice quality. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Love it, a little too big for my horse ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, a little too big for my horse but not enough that it won't work. I've always bought Weaver, love them!
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Halter
customer_reviews.text: I love this halter! It came in one of my favorite colors and fits my horse really well!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This halter says leather. There is not any leather on it! Cheaply made.

customer_reviews.title: Great halter that fits my 14
customer_reviews.text: Great halter that fits my 14.3 QH very well. I bought the average sized one and have it on the smallest holes. Sturdy product that seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and they fit my large headed mules perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice halter. My daughter loves the color and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice halter. My daughter loves the color and was so happy to receive it for her Quarterhorse at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz4Me

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Horse spooked and pulled on the lead, and the halter ripped in 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this halter. It has an easy to use throat latch and is very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my two year old Clydesdale
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two year old Clydesdale. Only complaint is how stiff the side snap is... hoping it will loosen a bit with time!
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey

customer_reviews.title: Turquoise doesn't match Weaver lead rope.
customer_reviews.text: Fine design but kind of an ugly turquoise. More of an aqua, and doesn't match at all the Weaver leadrope I bought in navy/blue/turquoise. I thought it it said turquoise and was from Weaver that the turquoise would be the same color on both items but they're not.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K

customer_reviews.title: Snap digs into horse's face
customer_reviews.text: Love the color which matched well with the displayed item. However, the snap hook at the end of the cheek strap digs into my horse's face! There's no way to reverse the snap so I've had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: L. C.

product_meta.title: Weaver Leather Basic Adjustable Halter
product_meta.description: Designed with dependable webbing and durable hardware, these nylon horse halters feature an adjustable chin and sewn in throat snap. Double-ply construction and box-stitching at stress points for added strength. Heavy-duty brass plated hardware.
feature_bullets: Features a sewn-in throat snap hook for easy on and off
